original_title: Inter-School Rugby: Vidyartha College beat Science College
original_body_lines: Vidyartha College Kandy edged Science College Colombo 26 points to 19 in the Dialog Under 19 Inter-School Rugby Tournament at the Bogambara Stadium in Kandy.
Vidyaratha College ran in four tries, with all but one being converted, while Science College scored three tries, of which two were converted.
